author: DMM
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2020
review_content: Ok so I found these hats by typing into the search bar “beanie”...this was the first product to pop up for me. I looked at reviews and saw all the positives about them being bigger, slouchy hats and thought, “ok this is what I want”. I ordered two and they just arrived today. (1-15-20). They seem to be made with decent material but the problem is, they are SO SMALL. I’m sorry, I have the tiniest, roundest, head EVER. I am famously known in my family and friends for having an unusually small round teeny tiny head. Mostly due to a jaw malformation I have had since birth. Usually, when I buy standard hats, (even ball caps) they are always so huge on me. And I have never bought a beanie/slouchy hat before, these were my first ones. I WANTED it to be bigger and slouchy. That was the point!!! So I read the reviews and looked at pictures of other Buyers and felt that I was going to get a big slouchy hat....NOW, I see that I was ripped off or received a product that was not as advertised. These hats have NO SLOUCH and they are so small. SO SMALL. For someone who has a normal sized head, these will NOT be beanies or slouchy hats. They will be small bowls sitting on top of their heads. I feel bad for all the people buying these hats thinking that they are going to fit their standard sized heads. Since they are so small on my tiny head, I can’t even imagine what they would look like on a normal head. I’m thinking the reviews I read were all old reviews from years ago when this hat was actually made right or made from a different company. But today, 1-15-2020, I received hats that were not as advertised or previously reviewed. So disappointed!!! I’m not even certain my 7 year old niece would get much of a slouch out of these hats!  With all that said, the hats are still cute for being standard winter hats. They are soft and stitched well as far as I can see. But there is absolutely no consistency on where these are made. Some in China, some in Honduras...looking at all the reviews, I see that we are all getting different products made from different places and to me, that indicates SCAM SCAM SCAM.  Shame on amazon for not filtering their suppliers a little better! If you want slouchy or saggy beanies/hats, go somewhere else because you will not get that from these hats. I will still use them, but my hunt for the perfect slouchy hat is still on. :/
title: Buyer beware, these hats are TINY!!!!

review_content: Either the C.C company who makes these beanies, have drastically reduced the quality of their products, or this is a knock-off.The moment I opened the package my first thought was, "this is not green, this looks brown." In the photograph, it's made to look like it's a slouchy beanie but it most definitely is not. You can see the difference in the photograph - my beanie, which is cream colored, to their beanie. I examined every inch of this and compared the two closely and the quality is definitely not the same. They both say 100% acrylic, but I can tell you with the utmost certainty, that these are not made from the same type of fabric. Mine is a much better quality. Theirs look like it's going to shrink and ball up when washed. As you can see, my cream colored beanie has retained it's slouchy shape after over 12+ years of ownership and many washes. I'm extremely disappointed. This looks like a knock-off product from China, unless, as I previously mentioned, the company has drastically reduced the quality of their products, to a far less superior quality, which would be a shame.I'm extremely disappointed and am returning it immediately.
